translations: 一片混乱；闹哄哄的场所

sentences.sentence: Pandemonium broke out when the news was announced.
sentences.translation: 这消息一宣布，立即乱成一片。

sentences.sentence: There was pandemonium in court as the judge gave his verdict.
sentences.translation: 当法官宣判时，法庭一阵嘈杂。

sentences.sentence: There was pandemonium in court as the judge gave his summing-up.
sentences.translation: 当法官做总结时，法庭上一片骚动。
